title: 1021 How to Connect with Presidents, Royalty & World-Class Celebrities w/Terrence J
description:
“Be specific to who you are and don’t worry about trying to please everybody. You’re not going to be able to please everybody!”

On today's podcast, Lewis sits down with three-time Emmy nominee, actor, host, producer, entrepreneur, and philanthropist Terrence J. They dissect Terrence's upbringing, and early career as well as how to create opportunity for yourself, build instant connections with anyone you meet, sustain a Success Mindset throughout your life and so much more!

For more, go to: www.lewishowes.com/1021

Check out BeWoke.Vote

Daymond John on How to Close any Deal and Achieve Any Outcome: https://link.chtbl.com/928-pod

Sara Blakely on Writing Your Billion Dollar Story: https://link.chtbl.com/893-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
